ingredients: 1 tbsp canned chipotle chile in adobo sauce
2 cups diced Roma tomatoes, cut into¼-inch pieces
½ cup diced white onion, cut into ¼-inch pieces
1 tbsp jalapeno, minced very fine with the seeds
Omaha Steaks Southwest Chipotle Seasoning, to taste
Omaha Steaks Southwest Chipotle Seasoning, to taste
